body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!-->


**What happened**: kube-scheduler crashes (panics) in rare circumstances. Stack trace:

```
Observed a panic: "invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" (runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference)
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:72
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:65
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:51
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:573
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:502
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:63
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/signal_unix.go:388
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/cache/node_info.go:386
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/core/generic_scheduler.go:909
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/core/generic_scheduler.go:831
/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/client-go/util/workqueue/parallelizer.go:47
/usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2361
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference [recovered]
	panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x40 pc=0x161223a]
goroutine 44674294 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime.HandleCrash(0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:58 +0x107
panic(0x418ba40, 0x85fd7f0)
	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:502 +0x229
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/cache.(*NodeInfo).Clone(0x0, 0xc428b44ac0)
	/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/cache/node_info.go:386 +0x3a
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/core.selectVictimsOnNode(0xc42e66c700, 0x60fa9e0, 0xc422c60630, 0x0, 0xc4215a5e00, 0x61505a0, 0xc4201a7ab0, 0xc425744980, 0x5, 0x8, ...)
	/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/core/generic_scheduler.go:909 +0x7d
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/core.selectNodesForPreemption.func1(0xf)
	/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/scheduler/core/generic_scheduler.go:831 +0x176
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/client-go/util/workqueue.Parallelize.func1(0xc4300e3c50, 0xc4302c94a0, 0xc429e60380)
	/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/client-go/util/workqueue/parallelizer.go:47 +0x96
created by k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/client-go/util/workqueue.Parallelize
	/workspace/anago-v1.11.2-beta.0.50+bb9ffb1654d4a7/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/client-go/util/workqueue/parallelizer.go:43 +0x10b
```

**What you expected to happen**: flawless operation ;)

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: Unclear. The error above looks like it was associated with some cloning of node metadata. Perhaps due to a race during node scale-up/scale-down and cache interactions.

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):

```
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11", GitVersion:"v1.11.2", GitCommit:"bb9ffb1654d4a729bb4cec18ff088eacc153c239", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-08-07T23:08:19Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

<!-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE -->
/kind bug
